title: Farewell to charms
creator_contributor_role: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Feminist motion pictures
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Women
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Feminist motion pictures
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Feminist motion pictures
description: An experimental feminist film which questions the goals of love and romance as a woman's ultimate fulfillment. Emma, vivacious but suicidal terrorist is reunited with Cecily, her old school chum. They meet a 'bionic bike dyke' called stretch and break open the jelly beans. Will they stretch a point over the pool table? Will tap-dancing and vaginal exercises be enough for Cecily? Will Emma metamorphose into Esther Williams? True romance. Cast includes Radda Jordan, Helen Pankhurst.
